Is Tumor necrosis factor receptor-associated periodic syndrome inherited ?,"How is tumor necrosis factor receptor-associated periodic syndrome (TRAPS) inherited? TRAPS is inherited in an autosomal dominant manner. This means that having a mutation in only one of the 2 copies
